description: Dashboard for detecting brute force authentication attempts

panels.title: Failed Login Attempts
panels.search: index=* sourcetype=WinEventLog:Security EventCode=4625 | stats count by src_ip, user | where count > 5

panels.title: Failed Logins Over Time
panels.search: index=* sourcetype=WinEventLog:Security EventCode=4625 | timechart count by user
